Class Torrent

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      Torrent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Torrent
extends java.lang.Thread

Torrent class is responsible for managing peers, pieces and the tracker in order to successfully download a file

Constructor Detail

Torrent

public Torrent(java.lang.String torrentMetaFile,
               java.lang.String outputFileName,
               java.lang.String peerID)
Pulls torrent information from metafile

Parameters:
torrentMetaFile - Name of .torrent file to read from
outputFileName - Name of file that will store downloaded data
peerID - PeerId of the client
Method Detail

printTorrentInfo

public void printTorrentInfo()
Debug method to print torrent info

init

public void init()
Initializes listenPort, peerList, pieceList, FileHandler, and Tracker object for tracker communication.

addPeer

public void addPeer(java.net.Socket incomingConn)
Handshake with a peer when it is trying to connect to us. If the handshake is a success, add the peer to peerList.

Parameters:
incomingConn - the socket of the incoming Peer

addNewPeer

public void addNewPeer(Peer incomingPeer)

sendHaves

public void sendHaves(Peer peer)
Sends have messages for all pieces that we have completed dling to a given peer.

Parameters:
peer - the peer that we are sending have messages to

startPeerThreads

public void startPeerThreads()
Handshakes with the peers we got from the tracker response and starts their message listening threads.

run

public void run()
Selects a port to listen on and listens for incoming connections. Schedules regular tracker communication.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

download

public void download()
Method to add requests for pieces onto request queues of peers. At this point we should have a list of peers that we are connected to inside peerList.

requestPiece

public void requestPiece(Peer peer,
                         int index)
Adds request messages for every subPiece of the desired piece, to the given peer's pending request queue. These will be sent later.

Parameters:
peer - the peer that we are trying to download the piece from
index - the piece that we are trying to download

broadcastHave

public void broadcastHave(int index)
Sends have messages for the piece at the given index to every peer in the peerList

Parameters:
index - the index of the piece

rerequest

public void rerequest(int index)
Clears the current piece data from the piece object at the given index, and marks it to be re-attempted for download.

Parameters:
index - the index of the piece

pieceReceived

public void pieceReceived(PieceMessage piecemsg,
                          Peer peer)
Handles an incoming piece message. If the piece is complete and the SHA1 hash is correct, writes the piece to file.

Parameters:
piecemsg - the incoming Piece Message
peer - the Peer we are receiving the piece from

public void requestReceived(RequestMessage request,
                            Peer peer)
Handles when we receive a request. Pulls and sends the requested piece from file.

Parameters:

peer - the Peer that sent the Request message
